TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. The mudkips are still in huge quantities and live longer than you.

I wish mushrooms were magic.

THIS IS PAGE 666

Edited May 24, 2014 by Tery215

Granted. Their magic corrupts you, and you die as a result.

I wish to have a battle axe.

Granted, your mother-in-law moves in with you permanently.

I wish the world wasn't so afraid of nuclear power.

Granted. They use it, but your closest reactor explodes.

I wish people would stop corrupting my wishes.

Granted, but they start to corrupt your mind, body, and soul instead.

I wish for blue.

The blue blinds you.

I wish for green.

the green poisons you

i wish for transparency

You lose yourself due to the fact that you cannot see yourself.

I wish for Hoenn.

Granted, but you board the wrong ship and end up in Johto.

I wish for good health.

Granted. I now am immortal.

I wish the impostor Mudkip disappeared.

Granted. You are no longer.

I wish for a lunch.

Granted, but because it's 667 it was made by Stan, neighbor of the beast. He's a bad lunch maker.

I wish for ogobobo!

Granted. You are crushed by a giant ogobobo.

I wish for an Apple apple.

Granted, but there's a new model coming out next year so why bother?

I wish that noone gets any wishes.

Granted. Instant paradox which results in the destruction of the earth.

I wish paradoxes didn't exist.

Granted, but this also removes ambiguity for some reason. Everything is now more boring.

I wish the education systems of every country in the G8 would come together and figure why they're so awful.

Granted. They continue being awful, because corrupt politics.

I wish that dirt was magic.

Granted: but then someone other than yourself uses the magic to make your life miserable.

I wish for jool to blow up

Granted. The entire Kerbol system explodes.

I wish for an army of Captain Jack Sparrows.

Granted, but they are all ghosts and therefore you cannot see them.

I want realistic aerodynamics.

Granted. You're in real life, and all the air around you has DOUBLE realistic aerodynamics. The universe explodes from massive creation of energy via aerodynamics.

I wish that methane was magic.

Granted. You're in real life, and all the air around you has DOUBLE realistic aerodynamics. The universe explodes from massive creation of energy via aerodynamics.

I wish that methane was magic.

Granted. Gazprom tower in Moscow, the headquarters of the largest Methane distributor in the world, becomes a dark spire of powerful dark wizards -- threatening to enslave the world, starting with Ukraine.

I wish icicles tasted like every candy flavour imaginable.

Granted. You go looking for one, and get impaled by the very one that you were looking for.

I wish that all the chemistry jokes Argon.

Granted but then all the xenon tanks argon too.

I wish for a number that tastes like chocolate.

Yes, dark chocolate. Muahahaha! (I actually love dark chocolate.)

I wish for cool explosions in 0.24.
